name: Newport Clam Chowder
author: OMMIE3
summary: This chowder it is outstanding! It won the chowder cookoff in Newport a few years ago. Try it, I guarantee that it gets rave reviews!
ingredients: 1 pound boiling potatoes, peeled and chopped
½ teaspoon chopped fresh dill weed
directions: Melt butter in a large kettle or stock pot over medium heat
Add onions and saute until clear
Stir in flour and cook over low heat, stirring frequently, for 2 to 4 minutes
In a separate pot, bring clams and clam juice to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes
In a small saucepan, cover peeled potatoes with water
Bring to a boil and cook until potatoes are tender, about 15 minutes
Slowly pour hot clam stock into butter/flour mixture while stirring constantly
Continue stirring and slowly bring to a boil
Reduce heat and add cooked potatoes
Mix in half and half, salt and pepper and chopped dill
Heat through but do not boil
